definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: There is unfortunately a lot of misunderstanding about optimism.
sentences.chinese: 可惜，人们对乐观主义有很多误解。

sentences.english: Many optimists I know are quick to point out that others have talents superior to theirs.
sentences.chinese: 我认识的许多乐观主义者会很快指出其他人更有才干。

sentences.english: But Gilding is actually an eco-optimist.
sentences.chinese: 但基尔丁实际上是一个生态乐观主义者。

sentences.english: By contrast, optimists today hope the economy will somehow reach 3-percent growth.
sentences.chinese: 相反，乐观主义者希望我们的经济增长能够达到3%。

sentences.english: That is what true financial optimism is.
sentences.chinese: 这才是真正的理财乐观主义。

sentences.english: Optimists might say that every cloud has a silver lining.
sentences.chinese: 乐观主义者可能会说，守得云开见日月。

sentences.english: The retro apartment is inspired y the youth and optimism 21 centuries.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪的活力和乐观主义诱发出独特的复古气氛。

sentences.english: That kind of optimism is hard for underwriters to price ahead of time. So is scarcity value.
sentences.chinese: 因为这种乐观主义而让承销商来提前标价是困难的。

sentences.english: That's what the optimists might say.
sentences.chinese: 那是乐观主义者的说法。
不过我是个乐观主义者。

sentences.english: A well-known British science writer (and former Economist journalist), Mr Ridley has taken on the mantle of rational optimism from the late Mr Simon.
sentences.chinese: 他从已故的西蒙先生那儿接过理性乐观主义的衣钵。

sentences.english: So maybe Bryant has turned into a cock-eyed optimist.
sentences.chinese: 也许科比变成了有些疯狂的乐观主义者。

sentences.english: That's a person who has been intimately acquainted with an optimist.
sentences.chinese: 那是曾和乐观主义者过从甚密的人。

sentences.english: And the Bible is not for na?ve optimists.
sentences.chinese: 圣经也不适合给天真的乐观主义者看。

sentences.english: Optimists insist opportunities still abound, but the stakes are undisputedly higher.
sentences.chinese: 乐观主义者认为机会无所不在，但是赌注正在变高。

sentences.english: Yet Mr. Gilding insists he is an optimist.
sentences.chinese: 但是，吉尔丁坚持说他是乐观主义者。

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
